nodes.text: The Besnia system was a star system located within the galactic regions known as the Colonies and the Slice. It was connected by the Hydian Way super-hyperroute to the Herzob and Koensayr systems, and was the origin point of Besnian sausage.
The Besnia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square N-12.
